data.comment: Lokomotiv Moscow kick-off the first half - the match is underway!
Saint Petersburg's Sardar Azmoun is whistled for offside at RZD Arena.
In the minute 3, Vladimir Moskalev blows against Lokomotiv Moscow's Anton Miranchuk for offside.
Throw-in Saint Petersburg.
Lokomotiv Moscow needs to be cautious. Saint Petersburg have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 5, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Lokomotiv Moscow have a goal kick.
Magomed Ozdoev for Saint Petersburg gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 6, Goal kick for Lokomotiv Moscow at RZD Arena.
Lokomotiv Moscow have a dangerous throw-in.
Vladimir Moskalev awards Lokomotiv Moscow a goal kick.
In the minute 8, Can Lokomotiv Moscow get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Saint Petersburg's half?
Lokomotiv Moscow push forward at RZD Arena and Stanislav Magkeev gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Saint Petersburg defence.
In Moscow Lokomotiv Moscow's Dmitry Rybchinskiy is caught offside.
In the minute 13, Vladimir Moskalev signals a Saint Petersburg throw-in in Lokomotiv Moscow's half.
Throw-in for Lokomotiv Moscow at RZD Arena.
Throw-in for Saint Petersburg close to the penalty box.
In the minute 16, Throw-in for Saint Petersburg in the half of Lokomotiv Moscow.
Saint Petersburg to take a throw-in in Lokomotiv Moscow territory.
Ball goes out of play for a Lokomotiv Moscow goal kick.
In the minute 18, Saint Petersburg awarded a free kick in their own half.
Vladimir Moskalev signals a Saint Petersburg throw-in in Lokomotiv Moscow's half.
Saint Petersburg have been awarded a corner by Vladimir Moskalev.
In the minute 21, It's a goal kick for the home team in Moscow.
Vladimir Moskalev awards the away team a throw-in.
Lokomotiv Moscow drive forward but Anton Miranchuk is judged offside.
In the minute 26, Vladimir Moskalev signals a free kick to Saint Petersburg in their own half.
Maciej Rybus (Lokomotiv Moscow) has received a yellow card from Vladimir Moskalev.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Sardar Azmoun.
In the minute 29, Corner awarded to Saint Petersburg.
Saint Petersburg's Malcom gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Lokomotiv Moscow defender.
Sardar Azmoun has recovered and rejoins the match in Moscow.
In the minute 31, Vladimir Moskalev awards Lokomotiv Moscow a goal kick.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Moscow.
Free kick for Lokomotiv Moscow in their own half.
In the minute 34, Francois Kamano is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
In Moscow Lokomotiv Moscow drive forward through Fedor Smolov. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Lokomotiv Moscow's Francois Kamano looks ok and returns to the pitch.
In the minute 36, Lokomotiv Moscow will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Saint Petersburg.
Saint Petersburg's Dejan Lovren gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Lokomotiv Moscow have a goal kick.
In the minute 38, Throw-in for Lokomotiv Moscow in their own half.
Lokomotiv Moscow awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Saint Petersburg in the half of Lokomotiv Moscow.
In the minute 40, Free kick Saint Petersburg.
Saint Petersburg have been awarded a corner by Vladimir Moskalev.
Ball safe as Lokomotiv Moscow is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 43, Viacheslav Karavaev of Saint Petersburg is pulled up for offside.
Throw-in for Saint Petersburg at RZD Arena.
2 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Lokomotiv Moscow's Stanislav Magkeev breaks free at RZD Arena. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Ball goes out of play for a Saint Petersburg goal kick.
Can Saint Petersburg get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Lokomotiv Moscow's half?
In the minute 45, Saint Petersburg to take a throw-in in Lokomotiv Moscow territory.
The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
Saint Petersburg kick-off the second-half u- the match is underway again!
In the minute 46, Free kick for Lokomotiv Moscow in their own half.
Corner awarded to Saint Petersburg.
Goal kick for Lokomotiv Moscow at RZD Arena.
In the minute 49, Throw-in Lokomotiv Moscow.
Ball goes out of play for a Saint Petersburg goal kick.
Yuri Zhirkov for the away team is judged to be offside.
In the minute 53, Saint Petersburg are whistled for offside.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Vladimir Moskalev signals a Lokomotiv Moscow throw-in in Saint Petersburg's half.
In the minute 56, Lokomotiv Moscow have a goal kick.
Vladimir Moskalev awards Saint Petersburg a goal kick.
Goal kick for Lokomotiv Moscow at RZD Arena.
In the minute 58, Vladimir Moskalev signals a throw-in for Saint Petersburg, close to Lokomotiv Moscow's area.
Free kick for Saint Petersburg in the half of Lokomotiv Moscow.
Saint Petersburg's Andrey Mostovoy has run offside.
In the minute 62, In Moscow Lokomotiv Moscow attack through Francois Kamano. The finish is off target, however.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Moscow.
Can Saint Petersburg get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Lokomotiv Moscow's half?
In the minute 63, In Moscow, Malcom of Saint Petersburg is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Ball goes out of play for a Lokomotiv Moscow goal kick.
Vladimir Moskalev signals a free kick to Saint Petersburg in their own half.
In the minute 65, Lokomotiv Moscow awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 66, Lokomotiv Moscow's Anton Miranchuk breaks free at RZD Arena. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Goal kick for Saint Petersburg at RZD Arena.
Lokomotiv Moscow make their first substitution with Vitali Lisakovich replacing Francois Kamano.
Eder is replacing Fedor Smolov for the home team.
Corner awarded to Saint Petersburg.
In the minute 68, Dejan Lovren (Saint Petersburg) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Eder (Lokomotiv Moscow) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
Saint Petersburg have a goal kick.
In the minute 70, Saint Petersburg have been awarded a corner by Vladimir Moskalev.
Corner awarded to Lokomotiv Moscow.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Moscow.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Saint Petersburg close to the penalty box.
In the minute 73, The away team have replaced Sardar Azmoun with Emiliano Rigoni. This is the first substitution made today by Sergey Semak.
The away team replace Yuri Zhirkov with Daniil Krugovoy.
In the minute 74, Vladimir Moskalev awards Lokomotiv Moscow a goal kick.
Lokomotiv Moscow's Eder gets in a shot on goal at RZD Arena. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Vladimir Moskalev awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 79, Saint Petersburg awarded a free kick in their own half.
Vladimir Moskalev signals a free kick to Saint Petersburg.
Rifat Zhemaletdinov is replacing Dmitry Rybchinskiy for Lokomotiv Moscow at RZD Arena.
In the minute 82, Ball safe as Saint Petersburg is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Lokomotiv Moscow have been awarded a corner by Vladimir Moskalev.
At RZD Arena, Vedran Corluka has been yellow-carded for the home team.
In the minute 86, Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Vedran Corluka for Lokomotiv Moscow who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
Rifat Zhemaletdinov is booked for the home team.
Sergey Semak (Saint Petersburg) is making a third substitution, with Aleksandr Yerokhin replacing Magomed Ozdoev.
In the minute 87, Aleksey Sutormin is on a sub for Malcom for Saint Petersburg.
Vladimir Moskalev awards Lokomotiv Moscow a goal kick.
Vedran Corluka is back on his feet again.
Free kick for Lokomotiv Moscow in their own half.
3 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Can Saint Petersburg capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Lokomotiv Moscow's half?
Vladimir Moskalev signals a free kick to Saint Petersburg in their own half.
Emiliano Rigoni (Saint Petersburg) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
Ball goes out of play for a Lokomotiv Moscow goal kick.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
That's full-time at RZD Arena. The final score is 0-0.
Vedran Corluka is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
Marko Nikolic (Lokomotiv Moscow) is making a fourth change, with Slobodan Rajkovic replacing the possibly injured Vedran Corluka.
